rule.name: RC_DYNAMIC_ERROR
rule.description: :message

rule.name: RC_DYNAMIC_WARNING
rule.description: :message

rule.name: Multiple class or interface is single file
rule.description: PHP file must contain only one class (or interface).

rule.name: File should match class name
rule.description: Class :name should be name after its enclosing :file.

rule.name: Class comment style
rule.description: Style comment should use "/** **/"

rule.name: Missing class comment
rule.description: Class comment is missing.

rule.name: Blank lines before class comment
rule.description: Class comment must be preceded by 2 blank lines.

rule.name: ERROR_PARSING_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Erreur de traitement commentaire de classe

rule.name: Empty class comment
rule.description: Class comment should not be empty

rule.name: Short description missing
rule.description: Short description is missing in class comment.

rule.name: EXTRA_LINE_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: :line ligne(s) supplémentaire(s) trouvée(s) avant la description courte du commentaire de classe

rule.name: BLANK_LINE_BETWEEN_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Il doit y avoir exactement 1 ligne entre les descriptions dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: Blank line before class comment
rule.description: Class attribute comment must be preceded by 1 empty line.

rule.name: SHORT_DESC_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: La description courte doit être sur une seule ligne dans un commentaire de classe

rule.name: TAG_NOTALLOWED_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: :tagname est un tag non autorisé dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: Missing @category tag
rule.description: @category is missing in class comment

rule.name: MISSING_PACKAGE_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Le tag @package est manquant dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: MISSING_SUBPACKAGE_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Le tag @subpackage est manquant dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: MISSING_AUTHOR_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Le tag @author est manquant dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: MISSING_VERSION_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Le tag @version est manquant dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: ONE_VERSION_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Un seul tag @version est autorisé dans le commentaire de classe

rule.name: MISSING_CONTENT_AUTHOR_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Tag @author vide dans le commentaire de la classe

rule.name: SUBVERSION_KEYWORD_AUTHOR_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Parametre $Author attendu dans le tag @author

rule.name: MISSING_CONTENT_VERSION_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Tag @version vide dans le commentaire de la classe

rule.name: SUBVERSION_KEYWORD_VERSION_TAG_CLASS_COMMENT
rule.description: Parametre $Revision attendu dans le tag @version

rule.name: STYLE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Il faut utiliser "/**" comme style pour le commentaire de fonction

rule.name: MISSING_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Commentaire de fonction manquant

rule.name: ERROR_PARSING_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Erreur de traitement commentaire de fonction

rule.name: FUNCTION_COMMENT_EMPTY
rule.description: Le commentaire de fonction est vide

rule.name: PARAM_TAG_ORDER_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Le tag @param doit suivre le commentaire de la fonction

rule.name: THROWS_TAG_ORDER_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: The @throws tag is in the wrong order; the tag follows @param

rule.name: TAG_NOTALLOWED_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: The @:tagname tag is not allowed

rule.name: MISSING_SHORT_DESC_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: La description courte dans le commentaire de fonction manquante

rule.name: EXTRA_LINE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: :line ligne(s) trouvé en plus avant le commentaire court de fonction

rule.name: BLANK_LINE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Il doit y avoir 1 ligne vide après la description courte dans le commentaire de fonction

rule.name: BLANK_LINE_TAGS_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: CAD_DOC_METH : Il doit y avoir 1 ligne vide avant les tags dans le commentaire de fonction

rule.name: TAG_NOTALLOWED_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: :tagname tag is not allowed in function comment

rule.name: TAG_RETURN_NOT_REQUIRED_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: @return tag is not required for constructor and destructor

rule.name: TAG_RETURN_MISSING_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Missing @return tag in function comment

rule.name: ONE_VERSION_TAG_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Une seule version du tag @return est admise dans un commentaire de fonction

rule.name: TYPE_MISSING_TAG_RETURN_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Type manquant dans le tag @return dans le commentaire de fonction

rule.name: TYPE_RETURN_INVALID_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Function return type :content is invalid

rule.name: TYPE_RETURN_VOID_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Function return type is void, but function contains return statement

rule.name: TYPE_RETURN_NOT_VOID_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Function return type is not void, but function has no return statement

rule.name: TYPE_RETURN_NOT_VOID_NO_STATEMENT_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Function return type is not void, but function has no return statement

rule.name: TYPE_RETURN_NOT_VOID_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Function return type is not void, but function is returning void here

rule.name: EMPTY_LINE_LAST_PARAMETER_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: No empty line after last parameter comment allowed

rule.name: PARAMETER_AFTER_COMMENT_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Parameters must appear immediately after the comment

rule.name: TWO_SPACES_VARIABLE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: CAD_DOC_METH : Il faut 2 espaces entre @param et le type de parametre dans le commentaire d'un type

rule.name: ONE_SPACE_VARIABLE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Expected 1 space before variable type

rule.name: VARIABLES_NAMES_NOT_ALIGN_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: The variable names for parameters :previousname (:previousnamepos) and :paramname (:paramnamepos) do not align

rule.name: COMMENTS_NOT_ALIGN_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: The comments for parameters :previousname (:previousnamepos) and :paramname (:paramnamepos) do not align

rule.name: EXPECTED_FOUND_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Expected :suggestedname found :typename for :paramname at position :paramnamepos

rule.name: TYPEHINT_MISSING_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Type hint :suggestedtypehint missing for :paramname at position :paramnamepos

rule.name: EXPECTED_TYPEHINT_FOUND_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Expected type hint :suggestedtypehint found :typehint for :paramname at position :paramnamepos

rule.name: UNKNOW_TYPEHINT_FOUND_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Unknown type hint :typeHint found for :paramname at position :paramnamepos

rule.name: DOCCOMMENT_NOT_MATCH_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Doc comment var :paramname does not match actual variable name :realname at position :paramnamepos

rule.name: SUPERFLUOUS_DOCCOMMENT_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Superfluous doc comment at position :doccommentpos

rule.name: MISSING_PARAMETER_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Missing parameter name at position :parameterpos

rule.name: MISSING_TYPE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Missing type at position :typepos

rule.name: MISSING_COMMENT_PARAM_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Missing comment for param :paramname at position :paramnamepos

rule.name: OPTIONAL_PARAM_START_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: Le commentaire pour le parametre :paramname doit commencer avec "(Optional)"

rule.name: ONE_SPACE_LONGEST_TYPE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: 1 espace attendu après la définition du type pour les paramètres

rule.name: ONE_SPACE_LONGEST_VARIABLE_FUNCTION_COMMENT
rule.description: 1 espace attendu après le nom de la variable pour les paramètres

rule.name: Missing function comment
rule.description: Function's comment is missing.

rule.name: STYLE_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Il faut utiliser "/**" comme style pour le commentaire de variable

rule.name: MISSING_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Commentaire de variable manquant

rule.name: ERROR_PARSING_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Erreur de traitement commentaire variable

rule.name: VARIABLE_COMMENT_EMPTY
rule.description: Commentaire de variable vide

rule.name: MISSING_SHORT_DESC_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: La description courte dans le commentaire de variable est manquante

rule.name: EXTRA_LINE_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: :line ligne(s) supplémentaire(s) trouvé avant la description courte du commentaire de variable

rule.name: BLANK_LINE_BETWEEN_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line between descriptions in variable comment

rule.name: SHORT_DESC_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: La description courte doit être sur une seule ligne dans un commentaire de variable

rule.name: BLANK_LINE_BEFORE_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Il doit y avoir exactement une ligne avant une ligne de tag dans le commentaire de variable

rule.name: TAG_NOTALLOWED_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: @:tagname tag is not allowed in variable comment

rule.name: ONE_VERSION_TAG_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Only 1 @version tag is allowed in variable comment

rule.name: TYPE_MISSING_VAR_TAG_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Var type missing for @var tag in variable comment

rule.name: EXPECTED_FOUND_VAR_TAG_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Expected :suggestedtype found :content for @var tag in variable comment

rule.name: EXPECTED_SPACES_FOUND_VAR_TAG_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: Expected :space spaces but found :spacing.

rule.name: MISSING_VAR_TAG_VARIABLE_COMMENT
rule.description: CAD_DOC_ATTR : Missing @var tag in variable comment

rule.name: NAME_START_LETTER_VALID_CLASS
rule.description: :name doit commencer par une majuscule

rule.name: NAME_NOT_VALID_VALID_CLASS
rule.description: CNM_NOM_CLASS : :name n'est pas un nom de classe correct

rule.name: NAME_NOT_VALID_NEWNAME_VALID_CLASS
rule.description: :name n'est pas un nom de classe correct; considerez :newName plutôt

rule.name: Method's scope not in camel case
rule.description: Method :scope should be named in camel case.

rule.name: Method's name not in camel case
rule.description: Method name should be in camel case.

rule.name: NAME_INVALID_MAGIC_METHOD_VALID_FUNCTION
rule.description: La fonction de nom :name est invalide; seulement les méthodes PHP magic methods doivent être préfixés par un double souligné

rule.name: NAME_INVALID_PRIVATE_METHOD_VALID_FUNCTION
rule.description: La fonction de nom :name est invalide; seul les méthodes privées doivent être préfixées par un soulignement

rule.name: NAME_PREFIXED_START_CAPITAL_LETTER_VALID_FUNCTION
rule.description: Function name :name is prefixed with a package name but does not begin with a capital letter

rule.name: NAME_NOT_VALID_INCOMPLETE_VALID_FUNCTION
rule.description: Function name :name is not valid; name appears incomplete

rule.name: NAME_INVALID_CONSIDER_NEWNAME_VALID_FUNCTION
rule.description: CNM_NOM_METH : Nom de fonction :name invalide; attendu :newname plutôt

rule.name: NAME_END_VALID_INTERFACE
rule.description: Le nom de l'interface ":name" doit se terminer avec "Interface"

rule.name: NO_START_UNDERSCORE_VALID_VARIABLE
rule.description: La variable de classe ":varname" ne doit pas commencer par un souligné

rule.name: NOT_VALID_CAMEL_VALID_VARIABLE
rule.description: CNM_NOM_VAR : la variable :varname n'est pas au format camelCase

rule.name: ATTR_NOT_VALID_CAMEL_VALID_VARIABLE
rule.description: Le nom d'attribut d'instance :varname n'est pas au format camelCase

rule.name: CONTAINS_NUMBER_VALID_VARIABLE
rule.description: La variable :varname contient des chiffres, cela n'est pas encouragé

rule.name: ONELINE_SCOPE_CLOSINGBRACE
rule.description: La fermeture d'un bloc se fait sur une nouvelle ligne

rule.name: EXPECTED_SPACE_DECREMENTSPACING
rule.description: CPC_INCR_NO_ESPACE : Expected no space before :operator 1 found

rule.name: XP: Class comment exception
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Class comment
rule.description: You must use /** style comments for a class comment

rule.name: XP: Class comment
rule.description: Class comment missing

rule.name: XP: Class comment
rule.description: Class comment is empty

rule.name: XP: Class comment
rule.description: Extra blank line found before class comment short description

rule.name: XP: Class comment
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line between descriptions in class comments

rule.name: XP: Class comment
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line before the tags in class comments

rule.name: XP: Invalid class comment tag
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Tag missing in class comment
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Tag duplicate in class comment
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Tags not groupped in class comment
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Class declaration
rule.description: Missing class opening or closing brace

rule.name: XP: Class declaration
rule.description: Whitespace found after class opening brace (on the same line)

rule.name: XP: Class declaration
rule.description: Expected exactly one space before class opening brace

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: You must use /** style comments for a file comment

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: Missing file doc comment

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: File header not directly following open tag

rule.name: XP: Class header exception
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: Extra newline(s) found before file comment short description

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: There must be an empty line between SVN ID tag and the description

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line between description and the ID Tag

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: SVN Id tag is corrupt

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: SVN Id tag is missing

rule.name: XP: Class header
rule.description: Extra content after SVN ID Tag

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: You must use /** style comments for a function comment

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: Function comment missing

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: Function comment is empty

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: Extra newline(s) found before function comment short description

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line between descriptions in function comments

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line before the tags in function comments

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: @throws tag must contain the exception class name

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: Missing @return tag in function comment

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: @return tag is empty in function comment

rule.name: XP: Doc comment var does not match actual variable name
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Superfluous doc comment
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Missing parameter name
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Missing parameter type
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: Expected 1 space after the longest type

rule.name: XP: Function comment
rule.description: Expected 1 space after the longest variable name

rule.name: XP: Doc comment for param missing
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected no spaces between argument and equals sign

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected exactly one space between default value and equals sign

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected no spaces between argument and comma

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected exactly one space between type hint and argument

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected exactly one space between comma and type hint

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected exactly one space between comma and argument

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected no spaces between opening bracket and type hint

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected no spaces between opening bracket and argument

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected no spaces between brackets of function declaration

rule.name: XP: Function declaration
rule.description: Expected no spaces between argument and closing bracket

rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Line exceeds limit
rule.description: :message

rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Equals sign not aligned correctly
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Equals sign not aligned with surrounding assignments
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Short PHP opening tag used
rule.description: :message

rule.name: XP: Short PHP opening tag used with echo
rule.description: :message

rule.description: Extra content before open tag

rule.name: XP: Closing brace must be on a line by itself
rule.description: :message
